data.expected_result: The @everyone module spawns and you mention everyone.
data.short_description: If you have a role that starts with `@ev`, using`@everyone` will not work.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a role called "EV" - Make the "EV" role mentionable by everyone - Return to chat and type @everyone - Press ENTER or click on the @everyone auto complete suggestion
